name: Kiki Chat Messenger: Free Private Friends Chats
description: Kiki Chat Messenger --- Instant, private, secure!  Kiki Chat Messenger is a free & private instant messaging app tailored for Android devices. It helps you enjoy instant messaging in a safe and secure way, connect with anyone constantly wherever you go!   With Kiki, you can securely send and receive instant text messages, make private phone calls, share photos, videos, emojis, stickers, audio, documents and many more, and explore a growing set of new features that help you stay connected.  Why Choose Kiki Chat Messenger?  Free Instant Messaging Kiki Chat Messenger makes connecting easier! Simply choose a friend from your contacts, invite him or her to Kiki, and you are free to chat, call and share with each other.    Private Friends Chats Thanks to our end-to-end encryption, any type of information you share on Kiki Chat Messenger will always remain to yourself and the person youre talking to. Keep yourself away from prying eyes.   Express Yourself with Emojis and Stickers There are so much that words cannot say, but emojis and stickers can do! Express your moments or emotion with fun emojis and stickers in Kiki Chat Messenger.    Create Groups for Privacy Wanna catch up with friends, family or business partners in a safe and private way? Just create a circle and invite them to it. Never worry about the privacy issues that are common on other social media networks, or your confidential business information being spread, intercepted, or hacked. Your privacy is 100% safe with Kiki Chat Messenger.    Secure Sharing Sharing is everywhere. Whenever you need a share for work, or for private, Kiki is right here! With Kiki Chat Messenger, all your shares including photos, videos, audio, documents, locations, contacts are well protected with our security system.    Self-Destructing Secret Chats Start a secret chat by setting up a self-destruct timer for your conversations. All messages you sent will be automatically deleted from both your and the recipients phones once the message is read.    Low-Cost Calls to Mobile and Landlines  To call mobile or landlines, you dont need Wi-Fi or cellular data but the Kiki Chat Messenger. Kiki allows you to call any mobile and landlines around the world with its low-cost international calling services. It can save a bundle off your current phone bills!   And So Much More:  Shake your phone to lock the screen   Personalize notifications to disguise incoming messages  Set fake passwords for others while you know the real one  Store photos, videos, documents, passwords to Kiki vault  Private phone calls with no records on phone bills  Block unwanted calls or spam calls  Customize your own voicemail greetings  Install Kiki Chat Messenger and Start Connecting Now!
